parameters.prompt:
=Create a professional Instagram cover post with a clean, modern design for educational content. The image should include:

LAYOUT REQUIREMENTS:
Square format (1080x1080px) ideal for Instagram posts
Clean, minimalist design with plenty of white space
Professional presentation style suitable for educational content

TEXT ELEMENTS:
Main title at the top in bold, readable typography: {{ $json.response.titulo_geral }}
Subtitle or brief description in smaller text below the main title
Small text in bottom right corner: 'Arraste para o lado' (in elegant, readable font)

VISUAL DESIGN:
Light, subtle background image related to {{ $json.response.titulo_geral }} topic (very low opacity, 15-25%)
Semi-transparent overlay to ensure text readability
Modern gradient or subtle overlay on top of background image
Clean borders or subtle frame
Typography should remain the main focus, with background image as subtle support

BACKGROUND IMAGE STYLE:
Relevant to the topic being discussed
Very light opacity (15-25%) so text remains highly readable
Blurred or soft focus effect
Positioned to not interfere with text placement
Professional, high-quality imagery

COLOR SCHEME:
Primary: Navy blue (#1e3a8a) and white
Semi-transparent overlay in light blue or white (60-80% opacity)
High contrast maintained for text readability
Background image should complement, not compete with text

STYLE:
Informational infographic style with visual appeal
Educational slide appearance with enhanced visual interest
Business presentation aesthetic
Text-focused layout with supporting imagery
Professional, trustworthy appearance

CONTENT FOCUS:
Topic: {{ $json.response.titulo_geral }}
Educational and informative tone
Social media optimized design
Visual storytelling approach

FINAL SPECIFICATIONS:
Resolution: High quality for Instagram
Format: Square (1:1 ratio)
Style: Clean, professional, educational, Instagram-ready with subtle visual enhancement

=Create a professional Instagram carousel slide with a clean, educational design for topic content. The image should include:

LAYOUT REQUIREMENTS:
Square format (1080x1080px) ideal for Instagram carousel
Clean, minimalist design with plenty of white space
Professional presentation style suitable for educational content

TEXT ELEMENTS:
Topic title at the top in bold, readable typography: {{ $json.titulo }}
3 bullet points with the key information from: {{ $json.pontos_chave }}
Summary text at the bottom: {{ $json.resumo }}

CRITICAL TEXT REQUIREMENTS:
REPRODUCE THE TEXT EXACTLY as provided in the JSON variables
DO NOT modify, translate, or alter any words
DO NOT add or remove accents (á, é, í, ó, ú, ã, õ, ç)
DO NOT change spelling or grammar
COPY the text character-by-character exactly as given
Maintain original Portuguese language formatting and special characters

VISUAL DESIGN:
Light, subtle background image related to {{ $json.titulo }} topic (very low opacity, 15-25%)
Semi-transparent overlay to ensure text readability
Modern gradient or subtle overlay on top of background image
Clean borders or subtle frame
Typography should remain the main focus, with background image as subtle support

BACKGROUND IMAGE STYLE:
Relevant to the specific topic being discussed
Very light opacity (15-25%) so text remains highly readable
Blurred or soft focus effect
Positioned to not interfere with text placement
Professional, high-quality imagery

TEXT FORMATTING:
Main topic title: Large, bold font with text shadow or background for readability
Bullet points: Medium-sized, well-spaced, easy to read with bullet symbols (•)
Summary: Smaller italic text, clearly separated at bottom
All text should have high contrast and readability over background image
ENSURE ALL ACCENTS AND SPECIAL CHARACTERS ARE PRESERVED

COLOR SCHEME:
Primary: Navy blue (#1e3a8a) and white
Semi-transparent overlay in light blue or white (60-80% opacity)
High contrast maintained for text readability
Background image should complement, not compete with text

STYLE:
Informational infographic style with visual appeal
Educational slide appearance with enhanced visual interest
Business presentation aesthetic
Text-focused layout with supporting imagery
Professional, trustworthy appearance
Consistent with cover slide design

CONTENT FOCUS:
Topic: {{ $json.titulo }}
Key points: {{ $json.pontos_chave }}
Summary: {{ $json.resumo }}
Educational and informative tone
Easy to read on mobile devices
Social media optimized design

TEXT ACCURACY PRIORITY:
The most important requirement is TEXT ACCURACY
Double-check all Portuguese accents and spelling
Use exactly the text provided in the JSON variables
NO modifications to the original text content

FINAL SPECIFICATIONS:
Resolution: High quality for Instagram
Format: Square (1:1 ratio)
Style: Clean, professional, educational, Instagram carousel slide with subtle visual enhancement
Consistent design language with the cover post
PERFECT text reproduction without any errors
